ygData.subject: Lute of the Gypsy Princess
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow Bards, I was wondering if anyone knows what the lute of the gypsy princess does.  I recently traded a barbed whip for it and cant tell much of a
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow Bards,

I was wondering if anyone knows what the lute of the
gypsy princess does. I recently traded a barbed whip
for it and cant tell much of a difference from my
normal lute. My fellow party members seem to think it
helps them heal faster, but when I tried to time it
the effect seemed the same. Any info would be greatly
appreciated. Thanks.

best regards

Lindros Silversong
Bard 24th circle E'ci
Archon Lords of Light
